member.name: M:ConsoleFx.CmdLineParser.WindowsStyle.WindowsParserStyle.VerifyCommandLineGrouping(ConsoleFx.CmdLineParser.WindowsStyle.WindowsParserStyle.ArgumentType,ConsoleFx.CmdLineParser.WindowsStyle.WindowsParserStyle.ArgumentType,ConsoleFx.CmdLineParser.ArgGrouping)
member.summary: This method is used by the code that validates the command-line grouping. It is called for every iteration of the arguments.
member.param: The type of the previously-checked argument.
The type of the currently-checked argument.
